topic.title: Installing on RHEL
topic.shortdesc: Installation using a package management system on RHEL.

body.p: First, download and install the appropriate meta-package from packages.couchbase.com. This will install the package source and Couchbase public keys:curl -O http://packages.couchbase.com/couchbase-release-1.0-0.noarch.rpm sudo rpm -i couchbase-release-1.0-0.noarch.rpm
Proceed with installing the actual Couchbase Server package: sudo yum update sudo yum install couchbase-server
